data: Rishav Mazumdar currently resides in Dhanbad, Jharkhand, India and is pursuing his Bachelors in The Undergraduate Programme in Electronics and Communication Engineering from Indian Institute of Information Technology, Ranchi.

Despite not being from CS major field, has strong interest in Computer Programming. During his early years as a fresheman in college, stepped into competitive coding and developed it as a hobby which continues till date.

As the next year stepped in, coronavirus pandemic displaced routine schedule. It was during this time that Rishav's hunger to learn grew and he learnt Web Development using PHP and MySQL and developed a few web applications.He also took up certificate courses from Coursera on Python Programming and Web Development using PHP + MySQL.
Later that year, he got his hands into MERN stack to work along with some of his batchmates on a few  Web Applications.

In personal life, an introvert person who loves to learn new things. Likes to develop applications which automate boring manual work wherever possible, so that he can find enough time to explore further into technology.
